alert.note: Alert for Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 5:19PM MDT until August 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Northwestern Gregory County in south central South Dakota... Western Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Hamill, or 18 miles west of Chamberlain, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Francis Case around 635 PM CDT. Chamberlain around 650 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dixon In Gregory County and Pukwana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
